title: bug can t open league of legends

embed.description: kida sur Héberger Image :: Hébergeur d'images gratuit.Images avec kida, Albums pour kida

body:
hi, when i try to open league of legends i have something weird anyone have a solution please ?  :)


Edit: patch 2,4 was dowload i can play one game and after i get disconnet them the probleme was arrived.

replies.body:
This usually happens if there are corrupt files in your League directory. You should be able to resolve this by grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a repatch. After booting up the app, simply check the box for *Force Repatch* and hit the **Start** button. After the process completes, launch League as admin (right-click the shortcut, select *run as admin*) and see if this is resolved.

Let me know the results!

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=YcQVyPjz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-09T02:52:44.172+0000)
>
> This usually happens if there are corrupt files in your League directory. You should be able to resolve this by grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a repatch. After booting up the app, simply check the box for *Force Repatch* and hit the **Start** button. After the process completes, launch League as admin (right-click the shortcut, select *run as admin*) and see if this is resolved.
> 
> Let me know the results!

hello , thx for you help that dont solve but i Uninstall the game and put back and Now it seems to work
